text: Exposing the secret hacks to supercharge your urban garden. Let's dive into the top urban farming hacks for high yield. First up, container gardening. Use deep, wide containers to give roots room to grow. Next, companion planting. Pair plants like tomatoes and basil. They help each other thrive. Don't forget vertical farming. Utilize walls and fences for climbing plants. Save space and boosts yield. Water smart. Use drip irrigation. It's efficient and reduces water waste. Mulch, mulch, mulch. It keeps soil moist and weeds at bay. Got pests? Try natural predators like ladybugs. Safe and effective. And finally keep planting cycles going. Rotate crops to keep soil healthy and productive. That's it. Happy farming. For more tips, hit that like button and subscribe.
